4310240.name: Hastilude Clash
4310240.description:
Hastilude Clash is a grounded, reaction-based party fighter where every move matters. Here, victory is decided by your reflexes and your ability to read your opponent.

As a knight in the arena, your goal is simple: hit them. But with a shield in every hand, landing a blow is a high-stakes game of "High-Low" mind games.

Core Features

  • Tactical Guarding: Your shield is your best friend, but only if you use it right. Predict a high strike to block up or drop your guard to protect your feet.

  • Epic Blade Clashes: When two attacks meet, the sparks fly! Frequent weapon clashes keep the tension high, occasionally leading to a Bladelock—a frantic wrestling match of strength and will.

  • The Perfect Parry: Timing is everything. Use a "Perfect Block" to parry incoming strikes or deflect projectiles right back at your enemies.

  • Grounded but Fast: Unlike other party fighters, Hastilude Clash keeps the fight on the floor. Walking up and attacking is easy, making the game accessible for beginners while offering a deep skill ceiling for veterans.

  • 4-Player Chaos: Whether it’s 1v1 duels or a 4-player free-for-all, the screen stays active with fast-paced knightly combat.

The Art of the Duel

Hastilude Clash revives the tension of classic directional swordplay. Success isn't about memorizing 20-button combos; it’s about reading your opponent's intent.
4310240.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
